instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.A1466: What is A1466? A1466 is a model number for a 13 inch size MacBook Air from years Early 2015, 2017, Mid 2012, Mid 2013, Early 2014 with EMC 2925, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-00165, 820-3209, 820-3437..

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1466</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> Doesn't come out of sleep when on battery alone
threads.message: Have an <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1466</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> that doesn't come out of sleep when on battery alone, at least more frequently than on charger as well--have not observed it while on charger. Reballed the SMC. Passes ASD OS with no issues. When the unit tries to come out of sleep, it just hangs with a black screen and active backlight. Eventually the unit will shut off and reboot with two chimes as though it PRAMed itself.

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1466</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> Doesn't come out of sleep when on battery alone
threads.message: Could be absolutely anything. Any history on this?
